subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kris Joseph and James Southerland each scored 19 points, and No. 5 Syracuse beat Albany, 98-74, to advance to the semifinals of the NIT Season Tip-off against Virginia Tech in New York.
snippet: Kris Joseph and James Southerland each scored 19 points, and No. 5 Syracuse beat Albany, 98-74, to advance to the semifinals of the NIT Season Tip-off against Virginia Tech in New York.
